text: Xinfengzhen railway station () is a station in Lintong District, Xi'an, Shaanxi. The station is the main marshalling yard for Xi'an railway hub and the largest marshalling yard in western China. ==History== The station was established in 1934. It was reconstructed as a marshalling yard in 2008. ==References== Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in Xi'an Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1934
title: Xinfengzhen railway station
